1002.BODY:
• Dashboard allows users to visualize environmental data through interactive charts.
  • It also showcases pollution visualization in the form of Pollution Rose and Wind Rose charts.
  • The real-time data is displayed over the dashboard along with hourly and weekly data.
  • It also provide download hourly data in csv format.

1004.BODY:
• Oizom data platform can provide automated / on-demand printable reports as per the industry standards.
  • These reports can be activated on a daily, weekly and monthly basis for multiple email recipients.
  • Reports module also provides Quick reports for any date.

1005.BODY:
• The Analytics module provides mainly three analytics criteria - device comparison, parameter comparison and chronological comparison.
  • The Device Comparison allows you to compare the performance of two or more installed equipments for the selected period.
  • The Parameter Comparison allows you to compare the multiple parameters of one equipment for the selected period.
  • Chronological Comparison analyzes the parameter data of equipment for different time slots.

1006.BODY:
• Using various data publishing mediums, environmental insights can be served to the mass audience at once.
  • The data publishing is possible through outdoor LED Display Boards, TV Screens and integrable Web Widget.
  • The data publishing can spread environmental awareness among citizens and enable them to take data driven health actions.

1007.BODY:
• The terminal can trigger actionable alerts in the form of push notifications, email notifications and SMS notifications for the users.
  • This feature drastically reduces the problem-to-solution time by taking data-driven actions.
  • User can able to add their own alert configuration.

1009.BODY:
• Cluster module can average your selected devices data and shows in eye catching map view and table view.
  • This feature makes easy to analyze the over all environmental status.
  • User can able to download historical data for any of clusters.
  • User can able to add their own cluster with selected devices.

1010.BODY: • Heat map provides eye bird view of pollution map, where user can able to know pollution details for every 100 meter of area.
